beer.name: Agave Wheat
beer.description: This true American-style unfiltered wheat has something a little special -- the nectar of the great Salmiana Agave. Agave complements the refreshingly light quality of our wheat and adds a subtle note of flavor that expands this beer's uplifting taste profile. It is familiar, yet creative.
